This package will contain the base Neural Network objects used to generate a neural network.

This package will contain the tests for the Neural Network bases.

compareNodeList(ArrayList<Node>, ArrayList<Node>) - Static method in class utils.NodeUtil

crossover(NeuralNetwork<ArrayList<Integer>>, NeuralNetwork<ArrayList<Integer>>) - Static method in class utils.GeneticAlgorithmUtil
This method will create a child neural network from two neural networks by randomly selecting nodes from both parents.

E

evolve(float, float, float) - Method in class learning.GeneticAlgorithm
This method will go through the next generation of neural networks by evolving the current ones.

This interface will be the lambda function for the fitness score of the genetic algorithm.

M

mutate(NeuralNetwork<ArrayList<Integer>>, float, float) - Static method in class utils.GeneticAlgorithmUtil
This method will mutate or change the weights of the nodes of a Neural Network based on the percent of nodes of a networks and the magnitude or the amount to change the individual nodes by.
mutateAll(float, float) - Method in class learning.GeneticAlgorithm
This method will mutate all the current neural networks.
